mapper.insert: insert into pg_stat_bgwriter (checkpoints_timed, checkpoints_req, checkpoint_write_time, checkpoint_sync_time, buffers_checkpoint, buffers_clean, maxwritten_clean, buffers_backend, buffers_backend_fsync, buffers_alloc, stats_reset) values (#{checkpointsTimed,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkpointsReq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkpointWriteTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{checkpointSyncTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{buffersCheckpoint,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{buffersClean,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{maxwrittenClean,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{buffersBackend,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{buffersBackendFsync,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{buffersAlloc,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statsReset,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select checkpoints_timed, checkpoints_req, checkpoint_write_time, checkpoint_sync_time, buffers_checkpoint, buffers_clean, maxwritten_clean, buffers_backend, buffers_backend_fsync, buffers_alloc, stats_reset from pg_stat_bgwriter
